meanings.definition: Shaped like a cluster of grapes.
meanings.sent1: The aciniform berries hung in bunches from the vine.
meanings.sent2: The aciniform flowers bloomed in colorful clusters.
meanings.sent3: The aciniform clouds in the sky looked like fluffy grape bunches.
meanings.sent4: Her aciniform hair cascaded down her back like a cluster of grapes.
meanings.sent5: The aciniform pattern on the dress made it look like a vineyard in full bloom.

meanings.definition: Resembling a cluster of grapes in form.
meanings.sent1: The aciniform decorations on the cake were adorable.
meanings.sent2: The aciniform balloons added a festive touch to the party.
meanings.sent3: The aciniform pillows on the couch made it look like a cozy grape cluster.
meanings.sent4: The aciniform clouds drifted lazily across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The aciniform design on the rug gave the room a warm and inviting feel.

meanings.definition: Having the form of a cluster of grapes.
meanings.sent1: The aciniform structure of the building was unique.
meanings.sent2: The aciniform arrangement of the lights created a magical ambiance.
meanings.sent3: The aciniform bushes in the garden made it look like a grape paradise.
meanings.sent4: The aciniform shadows danced on the wall as the sun set.
meanings.sent5: The aciniform shape of the necklace resembled a bunch of grapes.
